about_the_game:
PLAYTEST

The Environment Demo Playtest is now closed. Thank you all for your participation. Join our Discord to keep up to date with future events!

OVERVIEW

Vuntra City is an immersive city exploration game where every building can be entered. Explore a vast procedurally generated city, meet its inhabitants and uncover its secrets. Join one of the factions that control the city and work your way up the ranks to gain access to exclusive perks and locations. Own and customize interiors of your choice, if you can afford it.

Or just have relaxing rides on the city's public transport, have a virtual drink at one of the many bars and cafes and enjoy your stay at a park full of greenery. The game is about following clues and uncovering unique locations, NPCs, and items throughout the city, has minimal combat and no pressure. The city is there to explore and it is entirely up to you how you want to approach it. Can be played in VR or flat screen mode.

THE ENVIRONMENT

The city is 20x20 km (12.4 x 12.4 miles) in size and is fully accessible. Every street, every floor of every building, every penthouse and rooftop terrace can be visited and has a unique layout and atmosphere. You don't have to enter every building, but you can! There are varying quality levels to every space and the top ones are to die for. The city has a day and night cycle and weather changes.

TRANSPORT

Cruise through the city in a stylish hover car or take a ride in a futuristic sky tram. No matter where you're going, there are self driving cars that will get you to your destination, as well as a branching system of tram tracks high above the city.

INTERACTIVITY

Interact with everything for the most immersive experience. Break anything that's breakable but beware - going overboard will get you into trouble. Diegetic ingame interfaces will make you to feel like you're part of the city.

GAMEPLAY

Join one (or more) of the city's factions and help them fulfill their unique objectives. But beware, as some of them are enemies and don't take kindly to treason. Each faction has a variety of procedural missions that are specific to it, and will have you following clues and interacting with the city environment to complete them. And of course each one comes with a unique set of rewards for rising through its ranks.

STAY TUNED

The game is currently in development and more info will be added as it progresses.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 HQ
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 (Flat screen), GeForce RTX 2080 (VR)
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR, SteamVR, Valve Index, Meta Quest 2, Oculus Rift S
